Pasty - the cloud clipboard
 Copyright © 2012 by Philipp Geschke

 THIS SOFTWARE IS IN AN REALLY EARLY STAGE!

 For details see http://pastyapp.org
 That is also where you can create an account.

 Pasty was created using the following technologies:
 	Java on Android
 	node.js on the Appserver
 	node.js to power the WebApp
 	mongodb as storage backend
 	nginx to proxy the node.js instances
 	Ubuntu Linux powering the server
 
 Thank you for using Pasty! Any suggestions or comments? pastyapp.org
